title: Pixel 3 screenshots are saved as PNGs but are recognized as JPGs.
content: When I download a screenshot it downloads as a PNG but when I open in photoshop it says the extension is not recognized. I have to manually change from a PNG to a JPG to be able to open it. Very annoying! I have checked to see if you can change the file format on the phone and you can not on the Pixel 3.
